```r
library(HealthMarkers)
set.seed(1)
df <- data.frame(
  neutrophils = runif(10, 2, 6),
  lymphocytes = runif(10, 1, 3),
  monocytes   = runif(10, 0.2, 0.8),
  platelets   = runif(10, 150, 300),
  WBC         = runif(10, 4, 9),
  CRP         = runif(10, 0, 5),
  albumin     = runif(10, 35, 45)
)
cm <- as.list(names(df)); names(cm) <- names(df)
inflammatory_markers(df, cm, panel = "classic", na_action = "keep", verbose = FALSE)
```
